IX.iii.1.B.5.
a
.
Adjustments Based on Terminated Disability Social Security
For information about adjustments based on terminated disability Social Security benefits, see
M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, 1.H.3
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section B - Social Security Administration (SSA) Benefits Program
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section B
